mapper.select: SELECT m.*, mr.`roomname` AS roomname FROM meeting m, meetingroom mr WHERE meetingid IN ( SELECT meetingid FROM meetingparticipants WHERE employeeid =#{empid} ) AND m.`roomid` = mr.`roomid`

SELECT m.*, mr.`roomname` AS roomname FROM meeting m, meetingroom mr WHERE meetingid IN ( SELECT meetingid FROM meetingparticipants WHERE employeeid =#{empid} ) AND m.`roomid` = mr.`roomid` AND m. STATUS = 1
SELECT m.*, mr.`roomname` AS roomname FROM meeting m, meetingroom mr WHERE m.`reservationistid` =#{empid} AND m. STATUS = 0 AND m.`roomid` = mr.`roomid`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, description, status ) VALUES (#{meetingname},#{roomid},#{reservationistid},#{numberofparticipants}, #{starttime},#{endtime},#{reservationtime},#{description},#{status})
